snippet: New York prosecutors say Anna Gristina, who has been accused of orchestrating a multimillion-dollar brothel that catered to New York's wealthy elite, was arrested last month with an unnamed employee of Morgan Stanley.
abstract: New York prosecutors say Anna Gristina, who has been accused of orchestrating a multimillion-dollar brothel that catered to New York's wealthy elite, was arrested last month with an unnamed employee of Morgan Stanley.

headline.main: The Wall St. Link to a Prostitution Case
